channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weekend Recharge
channel.desc: Though it has "weekend" in the title, this show discusses the week ahead in addition to offering suggestions for what to do on Saturday and Sunday. Weather Channel meteorologists go beyond the elements outside and into the realm of lifestyle tips. Each host has a recurring segment on "Weekend Recharge," which include helping parents get a fresh start to each day and explaining how the weather is expected to impact the weekend's scheduled sports action.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Pattrn
channel.desc: Elevating the conversation about climate, extreme weather, sustainability and green living.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deep Water Salvage
channel.desc: Veteran salvor Paul Hay and his team rescue a clam-dredging crew's harvest lost in a storm off the New Jersey coast; following an annual cleanup operation in New Zealand that salvages fishing equipment gone astray.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deep Water Salvage
channel.desc: Capt. John Ward and his crew are called to raise a sunken houseboat near Pensacola, Fla.; the owner of the boat wants it back, but the current occupiers of the boat living in it don't want John's services; there've been reports of gunfire too.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Captain Greg Turner races a winter storm to save his stranded son, while Mack Kelley navigates unpredictable weather to keep family traditions alive.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Gail's hot streak comes with a target on her back; Greg faces the risks of hauling at night and Lex's issues stack up.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Joe Ray assesses damage in Maine following a winter storm, while restauranteur Susan Povich faces logistical challenges serving lobster in Brooklyn.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Mack surveys storm damage to his family's wharf, while Captain Lex steams into the Bay of Fundy and Gail shifts her gear to avoid more problems.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Blake struggles with a hand injury, while Mack grapples with superstitions and Captain Greg closely monitors lobster prices.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Prime Suspect: Earth
channel.desc: The investigation of some of the most notorious and mysterious events, in an attemp to unravel all of the possible reasons for the disasters.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Storm Stories: The Next Chapter
channel.desc: Elite skiers on a back-country adventure are hit by an avalanche; the myth that a tornado can never strike in the mountains comes crashing down when a twister strikes a Kentucky town in the Appalachian foothills.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Storm Stories: The Next Chapter
channel.desc: A flash flood at an Arkansas campsite leaves 20 dead; when a tornado pulverizes a tiny Alabama town, a doctor rescues a teenage girl who was left for dead.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weird Earth
channel.desc: Satellite images of violent vortexes above a volcanic island; a man films a dazzling heavenly vision over suburban rooftops.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weird Earth
channel.desc: A twisting swarm of menacing aerial creatures glides above the suburbs; bizarrely parting seas suggest connections to ancient legends; a volcano produces deadly hair-like fibers.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weird Earth
channel.desc: A devastating river of mud and rocks threatens a sleepy mountain valley; bizarre patterns beneath a frozen river may be strange morphing creatures; a jellyfish-shaped cloud may be a sign of dangerous weather to come.
